tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT,
    task_description TEXT,
    deadline TIMESTAMP,
    is_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description TEXT,
    deadline TIMESTAMP,
    is_completed BOOL
)
CREATE TABLE reminders ( reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name TEXT, deadline_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, email TEXT );
CREATE TABLE tasks ( task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, task_name TEXT, description TEXT, deadline_date DATE, user_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) );

CREATE TABLE notifications ( notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, reminder_id INT, notification_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (reminder_id) REFERENCES reminders(reminder_id) );
CREATE TABLE reminders_history ( reminder_id INT, action TEXT, action_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (reminder_id) REFERENCES reminders(reminder_id) );
